main.name: Adam Walker
main.bio: Hey there! I'm Adam. Over the years I have built a passion for technology. I love learning new technologies, how they work and integrate together, and building projects that are useful in day-to-day life. I am currently working at Visa Inc. as a Software Engineer, developing security features to improve client experiences.

education.description: Exracurricular activites: SJSU Software & Computer Engineering Society | Men’s Ultimate Frisbee

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Developed and maintained security software applications for Visa's payment processing gateways.
work.description2: Implemented REST API for Key Management Services using Java and Maven framework.
work.description3: Debugged and resolved complex authentication issues and implemented improvements to enhance client experience.

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: Scripted automation process using Python and best security practices to transfer over 600 repositories to a new hosting platform.
work.description2: Analyzed company’s current CI/CD build configurations in order to organize plan migration.
work.description3: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure optimal infrastructure design and configurations

projects.title: Canadian Wanderlust
projects.category: My Travel Blog for my post-university travels
